pullRequest.title: Incoporating 1-n NodeSummary changes for Hot Shard RCA
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of changes: NodeSummary has been made to support 1:n summary, incorporating the same within Hot Shard RCA
Other Minor changes include :

Adding HotShardClusterRca to be query-able by RCA APIs
Fixing broken tests

By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.

commit.message: Incoporating 1-n NodeSummary changes for Hot Shard RCA

nodes.bodyText:
We are gathering metrics at shard level here and at each iteration we are creating a new object. I wonder how much garbage we are creating here. We should try to reuse objects.
In the RCA periodic samplers, we should add a metric to get the gc count and duration metrics.
We have a lot of instanceof scattered around. It might be worth while to create an enum type of Summaries and then we can compare against an enum value

commit.message: Addressing PR comments and adding UT
